Ethos.metaDescription: Discover the philosophy and values behind Ferya's bespoke event design studio.
Ethos.label: Our Ethos
Ethos.heading: Beauty in Every
Ethos.p1: At Ferya, we believe that every celebration is a canvas — an opportunity to create something beautiful, meaningful, and deeply personal. Our work is rooted in the conviction that the details matter, that the invitation your guests hold in their hands should be as extraordinary as the event itself.
Ethos.p2: Drawing from the rich traditions of Islamic geometric art, Arabic calligraphy, and contemporary design, we create pieces that honour cultural heritage while embracing modern elegance. Each design is a dialogue between past and present, tradition and innovation.
Ethos.p3: We are committed to sustainability and ethical craftsmanship. Our materials are sourced responsibly, our processes minimize waste, and our designs are created to be cherished — not discarded. Because true luxury is thoughtful.
Ethos.value1Description: Every design reflects the true essence of our clients — their stories, their heritage, and their dreams for the celebration ahead.
Ethos.value2Description: We pursue perfection in every stroke, fold, and finish. Our standards are uncompromising because your moments deserve the very best.
Ethos.value3Description: Design is a bridge between people. We create pieces that foster connection, evoke emotion, and become treasured keepsakes.

Process.metaDescription: Learn about Ferya's bespoke design process — from consultation to delivery.
Process.label: Our Process
Process.heading: How We
Process.description: Our collaborative process ensures every detail is perfect. Here's how we bring your vision to life.
Process.step1Description: We begin with a complimentary consultation to understand your vision, event details, and aesthetic preferences. Share your inspiration, colours, and cultural elements that matter to you.
Process.step2Description: Our designers create bespoke concepts tailored to your event. You'll receive detailed mockups and material samples to review, ensuring every element aligns with your vision.
Process.step3Description: We refine the designs based on your feedback, perfecting every detail — from typography and colour to paper weight and finishing techniques. Up to two rounds of revisions are included.
Process.step4Description: Once approved, our artisans bring your designs to life using premium materials and expert techniques — letterpress, foil stamping, laser cutting, hand-painting, and more.
Process.step5Description: Your finished pieces are carefully packaged and delivered to your door or venue, ready to delight your guests and make your celebration truly unforgettable.

FAQ.metaDescription: Frequently asked questions about Ferya's bespoke event design services.
FAQ.label: FAQ
FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked
FAQ.q1: How far in advance should I book?
FAQ.a1: We recommend booking at least 3-6 months before your event for stationery suites, and 6-12 months for large-scale signage and installations. This ensures ample time for design, revisions, and production. For rush orders, please contact us to discuss availability.
FAQ.q2: Do you offer custom designs only, or do you have templates?
FAQ.a2: Everything we create is 100% bespoke. We do not use templates. Each design is crafted from scratch based on your unique vision, event details, and personal style. This is what sets Ferya apart.
FAQ.a3: Pricing varies based on the scope of work, materials chosen, and quantity. Invitation suites typically start from $450, while signage begins at $280. We provide detailed quotes after our initial consultation so there are no surprises.
FAQ.a4: Yes! We serve clients worldwide. All orders are carefully packaged and shipped via insured courier. International shipping costs and timelines vary by destination and are provided with your quote.
FAQ.q5: Can you incorporate cultural elements into the designs?
FAQ.a5: Absolutely. Cultural storytelling is at the heart of what we do. We specialize in Islamic geometric art, Arabic calligraphy, and designs that honour diverse cultural traditions. We work closely with you to ensure every element is meaningful and authentic.
FAQ.q6: How many revision rounds are included?
FAQ.a6: Our standard packages include two rounds of revisions at the concept stage. Additional revisions are available at an hourly rate. Most clients find that two rounds are more than sufficient, as we invest significant time in the initial consultation to understand your vision clearly.
FAQ.a7: We work with premium materials including hand-pressed cotton papers, genuine gold and silver foil, premium acrylics, sustainably sourced wood, and archival-quality inks. Specific material options are discussed during the design phase.
FAQ.a8: Deposits are non-refundable as they cover initial design work. Cancellations before production begins receive a refund of remaining balance minus the deposit. Once production starts, cancellations are subject to a fee covering materials and labour completed. Full details are provided in our service agreement.

Policy.metaDescription: Ferya's ordering, payment, cancellation, returns, and shipping policies.
Policy.label: Policies
Policy.heading: Our
Policy.orderingText: All orders begin with a consultation to discuss your vision and requirements. Once a design direction is agreed upon, we provide a detailed quote. A 50% deposit is required to begin design work, with the remaining balance due before production begins. Orders are confirmed only upon receipt of the deposit.
Policy.paymentsText: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal. All prices are listed in USD unless otherwise specified. Payment plans may be available for large orders — please inquire during your consultation. All payments are processed securely through our payment provider.
Policy.cancellationsText: Cancellations must be communicated in writing via email. If cancelled before design work begins, a full refund minus a $50 administrative fee will be issued. After design work has started, the deposit is non-refundable. After production begins, no refunds are available for work and materials already committed.
Policy.returnsText: Due to the bespoke nature of our products, we do not accept returns or exchanges on custom-made items. If an item arrives damaged during shipping, please contact us within 48 hours with photographs, and we will arrange a replacement at no additional cost.
Policy.shippingText: All orders are shipped via insured courier service. Domestic orders (US) typically arrive within 5-7 business days after production is complete. International orders take 7-14 business days depending on destination. Expedited shipping is available at additional cost. Tracking information is provided for all shipments.

Privacy.metaDescription: Ferya's privacy policy — how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
Privacy.label: Privacy
Privacy.heading: Privacy
Privacy.collectionText: We collect information you provide directly: your name, email address, phone number, event details, and billing/shipping addresses when you place an order or submit an inquiry. We also automatically collect certain technical data such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited to improve our website experience.
Privacy.usageText: Your information is used to: process orders and deliver your products, communicate about your project, send order confirmations and shipping updates, respond to inquiries, improve our website and services, and send occasional newsletters (with your consent). We never sell your personal information to third parties.
Privacy.cookiesText: Our website uses essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences (such as language choice). We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our site. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Our payment processor may also set cookies necessary for secure transactions.
Privacy.thirdPartiesText: We work with trusted third-party services for: payment processing (Square), email communications (Resend), spam protection (Cloudflare), and website hosting (Vercel). Each of these services has their own privacy policy. We share only the minimum information necessary for them to provide their services.
Privacy.rightsText: You have the right to: access your personal data, correct inaccurate information, request deletion of your data, opt out of marketing communications, and request a copy of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@ferya.co.
Privacy.updatesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
